title: pantheon jungle open in 4.20
body:
start either blue, red, or the toad. hit level 2, go to dragon pit by 230 spawn. kill dragon #1 by 333. you probably need some attack speed in your runes and masteries but there are different combinations possible. aegis abuse makes it possible to not take a single hit from dragon, walk out at 333 with a red/blue & dragon buff & then proceed to gank mid/bot. 

only legitament way to stop is to ward (every game, always, 3-8+ on map start to finish) & gank @ first dragon between spawn+1

nunu can probably do something similar but you will need flat cdr or something, probably

replies.body: In that time spent taking drag and not counter ganking means it's possible that both mid and top could of been killed or had summs forced making that 8% ad/ap not exactly be worth since solo laners have lost so much pressure and with the current meta coming back isn't exactly easy.

Pantheon? Only scrubs and rejects play him.

#DeletePantheon2014

8% damage and 3% movement speed over your enemies by 15 minutes for your entire team is nothing to be snuffed at

P is balanced but I think his mechanic lines of code should be addressed, explicity for w. I could submit a bug support on average at least once a game of w being buggy, that is over 2 years of observation with no change.
nope its bad dont even try it just stop playing him right now
With flat attack speed except for quints you can theoretically never take a hit at level 2 with no blue buff.

I saw a video of Fiora doing dragon at level 3. Using her lunge she can dodge dragons AA twice because his AA (at least at the time) works like a skill shot in order to be AOE.
And she can also parry his attacks.

It was much closer than panth.

Panth pretty much the only one who can since he can block the damage completely. Fiddle and Nunu can't heal fast enough at lower levels to negate the damage Dragon does.

Panth can solo Drag level 3, with normal AD runes (AD marks/quints, Armour seals, MR glyphs) and blue buff. Just have to time your W and Q to make sure you don't "waste" abilities when you already have passive up
